CustomField.description: This field is to indicate if the Case is considered open. Used for Flows
CustomField.formula: CASE (TEXT(Status__c ), "New", "True", "Under Investigation", "True", "Conf. Scheduled", "True", "Pending Settlement", "True", "Awaiting Approval", "True", "Hearing Approved", "True", "Hearing Scheduled", "True", "ODA Issued", "True", "Reopened with Senior Approval", "True", "Pending - Incomplete", "True", "BOFE Stay", "True", "Open", "True", "Pending", "True", "Settled - Payment Plan", "True", "Screened / Pending Unit Review", "True", "Pre-Investigation", "True", "Conference", "True", "Report Submitted", "True", "Appealed", "True", "Awaiting Compliance", "True", "Law School Referral", "True", "Hearing", "True", "False" )
CustomField.label: Open Case
